text_block_list.text: Sakura Bakushin O is set to run three 1200 meter races. She's training hard every day.
But she doesn't want to run just short distances. The next race after these three, she might not be convinced anymore.
While I was thinking about this, I was walking around campus and came across…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Good for you, Ms. Flower! The doctor even complimented you on your quick recovery!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: It's all thanks to Ms. Bakushin O helping me.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: I think it would have taken me a long time to carry all these books by myself.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much for the help.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, not at all! If I help you, it's inevitable that the process will speed up!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Bakushin O-chan. Do you remember what we're gonna do tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course I do! You wanted me to give you some tips on how to get started, didn't you!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Oh, I'm glad. Yeah, thanks for the help.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: And I think it's time to celebrate, don't you? We've all been looking for you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha! It's that time already!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll be right there! Now, let's be off, and you too, Ms. Flower!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait a second…!
If there was a celebration, something good probably happened to Sakura Bakushin O. I decided to go check it out.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――and, so!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That is how I, Sakura Bakushin O! Managed to shave five seconds off the record time for the quickest change from uniform to jersey!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Quickest change…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you all very much for coming to celebrate this momentous occasion!

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: Congratulations～! (Clapclapclap!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What do you think, Ms. Flower? I'm both fast on my feet and fast at changing clothes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In fact, I'm also the current record holder for fastest talker! I can't wait to break that one, too!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: U, umm… That's sure great!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: But lately, you've been doing even better than before. I guess you could say your speed's been honed.

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text: Definitely! That's what my homeroom teacher said, too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmm! What did you say!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text: She said she appreciated how quickly you collected everyone's papers. She also said it would be even better if you could be more careful, though.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-haaa, our teacher, you say! She praised me that much!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president, I'm quite proud of myself!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Uh, huh, yup. I'm counting on you for your speed. I'll keep relying on you, class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I was relied on――!!
…The contents of the congratulations were heartwarming, and I caught a glimpse of Sakura Bakushin O, so beloved by all of her classmates.
…Later, while walking through the school, I saw a pair who seemed to have finished partying.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Whew, I received quite a lot of compliments! That's me! The president paragon!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ahaha…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: But, it looks like Ms. Bakushin O is really adored by everyone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! As class president, it's my chief job to be adored!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Moreover, now I'm an upgrade from before! I'm the president of presidents!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: After all, thanks to my Trainer's precise guidance, I'm in great shape!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Fufu, so that's how it is.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! Even now, I'm aiming to run 3 short distance races so I can run in a long distance race!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: 3 short distance races…?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Well, that's, that's just running short distances, isn't it…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmm? I think I just heard someone's heart leaping somewhere…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Anyway, this is still a bona-fide long distance. It may still be tough for you, Ms. Flower.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufu. Just follow your Trainer and you'll be just fine!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In fact, since working with the Trainer, I've been relied on more than ever.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My Trainer will absolutely make my dreams come true!!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: You believe in your Trainer a lot, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course!
Unexpectedly, I heard Sakura Bakushin O's true feelings, and my heart was filled with passion.
Because she believes in me, I have to lead her well… Down the Bakushin Road, where she can shine her absolute best!
